@keyframes show {
  0% {
    bottom: -61px;
    opacity: 0;
  }

  100% {
    bottom: 24px;
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes hide {
  0% {
    bottom: 24px;
    opacity: 1;
  }

  100% {
    bottom: -61px;
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

.toast {
  position: fixed;
  right: 16px;
  bottom: -61px;
  left: 16px;
  z-index: 12010;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  max-width: 343px;
  margin: 0 auto env(safe-area-inset-bottom);;
  padding: 12px 8px 12px 12px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  background-color: #121212;
  animation: show 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.33, 1, 0.68, 1) forwards, hide 0.3s 1.8s cubic-bezier(0.33, 1, 0.68, 1) forwards;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Apple SD Gothic Neo', Roboto, 'Noto Sans CJK KR', Arial, '맑은 고딕', 'Malgun Gothic', sans-serif;
  color: #fff;
}

.icon {
  flex: none;
  margin-right: 12px;
}

.text_area {
  flex: 1 1;
  overflow: hidden;
  line-height: 17px;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.title:only-child {
  font-weight: 400;
}

.description {
  margin-top: 2px;
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.ab-in-app-message.ab-slideup {
  box-sizing: border-box !important;
  min-width: calc(100% - 32px) !important;
  max-width: calc(100% - 32px) !important;
  margin: 16px !important;
  margin-top: calc(constant(safe-area-inset-top, 0) + 16px) !important;
  margin-top: calc(env(safe-area-inset-top, 0) + 16px) !important;
  margin-right: calc(constant(safe-area-inset-right, 0) + 16px) !important;
  margin-right: calc(env(safe-area-inset-right, 0) + 16px) !important;
  margin-bottom: calc(constant(safe-area-inset-bottom, 0) + 16px) !important;

  margin-left: calc(env(safe-area-inset-left, 0) + 16px) !important;
  padding: 8px 12px !important;
  border-radius: 4px !important;
}

.ab-in-app-message.ab-slideup .ab-image-area {
  position: relative;
  width: 36px !important;
  height: 36px !important;
  border: none !important;
  vertical-align: middle !important;
}

.ab-in-app-message.ab-slideup .ab-image-area img {
  border-radius: 4px;
  vertical-align: top;
}

.ab-in-app-message.ab-slideup .ab-message-text {
  height: 44px;
  border-top: 0 !important;
  border-bottom: 0 !important;
  border-left-width: 4px !important;
  line-height: 1.58 !important;
  font-weight: 400;
}

.ab-in-app-message.ab-slideup .ab-message-text.ab-with-image {
  border-left-width: 12px !important;
}

.ab-in-app-message.ab-slideup .ab-close-button {
  padding-right: 14px !important;
}

.ab-in-app-message.ab-slideup .ab-close-button svg.ab-chevron {
  width: 9px !important;
  height: 15px !important;
